main event: Three mushroom-shaped objects were observed over Annapolis, Maryland, on April 13, 1954, with ground-visual observations lasting about 10-15 minutes.
interesting points: The objects caused blinding flashes before exploding,The sighting was also reported by an aircraft pilot over the area,The observers were a group of civilians including a housewife and military personnel, Welding activity was taking place on a radio transmission tower at the same time, Weather conditions were noted as clear with a slight freeze.
witness description: civilians including a housewife and a military commander
